for t in range(int(raw_input())):
    n=int(raw_input())
    N=map(int,raw_input().split())
    
    for i in range(n-1):
        temp=0
        if i%2==0:
            if N[i]>N[i+1]:
                temp=N[i]
                N[i]=N[i+1]
                N[i+1]=temp
        else:
             if N[i]<N[i+1]:
                temp=N[i]
                N[i]=N[i+1]
                N[i+1]=temp
    for i in N:
        print i,
